contents.text: Thank you for calling Udacity South Bay, your partner in online education and career advancement.
To hear our course offerings and enrollment options, press 1.
To explore programming and data science nanodegree programs, press 1.
One moment please while we connect you with an enrollment advisor for our programming and data science courses.

navigationGoals: I need to speak with an advisor about enrolling in a programming and data science nanodegree.
I want to speak with an enrollment advisor about the programming and data science nanodegree to help me transition from the military into tech.
Connect me to an enrollment advisor to discuss programming and data science nanodegree offerings.
I want to speak with an enrollment advisor about joining a programming or data science nanodegree.
I’d like to learn about enrolling in the data science nanodegree program and the next steps for registration.

contents.text: To learn about corporate training solutions and group pricing, press 2.
Please hold for our corporate partnerships team.

navigationGoals: I want information on corporate training packages and group pricing options.
I’m organizing a group training for fellow veterans and need corporate pricing details for Udacity courses.
I need details on enterprise licensing and group pricing for your corporate training solutions.
I’d like information on corporate training solutions and group pricing.
I’m organizing a physics club workshop and need details on group training packages and pricing.

contents.text: For help with your current courses, press 2.
If you need technical support, press 1.
Connecting you to technical support. Please stay on the line.

navigationGoals: I’m experiencing technical issues with my current course and need support.
I’m experiencing technical issues accessing my current course materials.
Provide technical support to troubleshoot my development environment in my current course.
I need technical support for a problem accessing my current course.
I’m having trouble loading my course materials in the online IDE and need technical assistance.

contents.text: For billing or account inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: I have a billing question about my account and need help updating my payment details.
I have a question about a recent charge on my Udacity account.
I want to review my billing statement and account charges for my ongoing courses.
I have a question about a charge on my billing or account.
I’d like to review my payment history and update my billing information for my current Nanodegree.
